=== lo’a/lo’i/lo’o family coverage ===

lo’a tavla
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base loa) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))

lo’i tavla
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base lohi) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))

lo’o tavla
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base loo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))
